text: Cumaribo Airport is an airport serving the town of Cumaribo in the Vichada Department of Colombia. The runway is east of the town. The runway may be undergoing extension on its north end to . ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Cumaribo *FallingRain - Cumaribo Airport *HERE/Nokia - Cumaribo Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
